service.title: Server-Sent Events
service.documentation: specification defines an API for opening an HTTP connection for receiving push notifications from a server in the form of DOM events. The API is designed such that it can be extended to work with other push notification schemes such as Push SMS.

mediatype.documentation: Defines a media type for representing an event stream for Server-Sent Events.

document.title: Event Stream
document.documentation: An event stream as represented by Server-Sent Events.

http-header.documentation: The Last-Event-ID HTTP header specifies the value of the event source's last event ID string, encoded as UTF-8.
